title: Florida just became the largest state to mandate personal finance education in high school - CNBC
content:
1. Florida just became the largest state to mandate personal finance education in high school  CNBC
  2. Governor Ron DeSantis Signs Financial Literacy Bill to Support Florida's Students  Florida Governor Ron DeSantis
  3. DeSantis signs bill requiring a financial literacy course for graduation  Tampa Bay Times
  4. Florida to require high school financial literacy class to graduate  New York Post
  5. Florida becomes 11th state to guarantee personal finance course to high schoolers; Stiles-Nicholson Foundation and Next Gen Personal Finance investing $1 million for teacher professional development  PR Newswire
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: On Tuesday, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis signed bill SB 1054, which mandates personal finance education for high school graduation.
